casebody.data:
Lynda THOMAS and Samuel V. Thomas, Plaintiffs-Appellants,
v.
DOLLAR GENERAL CORPORATION, Defendant-Appellee,
and
Bashir Patterson McGee and Sara Swope, Defendants. SC: 157660
COA: 337013 Supreme Court of Michigan. September 12, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the March 15, 2018 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
